topicTitle: Can we please fix the mess at the top of my page?

posts.postText:
Its been MONTHS since we laid our chatbox to rest, and we still haven't fix it OR the failed abortion on the top of our forums. can we work toward getting that fixed?
i have a few ideas as to getting it replaced:
1 What changed that made it do that
2 GOOGLE
3 E-mail some phpbb guy about it and a possible resolution
3 switch to http://www.facepunch.com/ kind of forum. i REALLY like this idea.

I wouldn't even mind the shit at the top if the chatbox came back.

But I believe the main reason for this was because Ben was very busy lately, and just now I think he's savored some time, so maybe if he doesn't have more major issues he could possibly fix this.
What exactly is appearing at the top? And what theme are you using that is causing it?

>> // 0) { if (base_url.indexOf(''?'') == -1) { document.location.href = base_url + ''?start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } else { document.location.href = base_url.replace(/&/g, ''&'') + ''&start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } } } /** * Find a member */ function find_username(url) { popup(url, 760, 570, ''_usersearch''); return false; } /** * Mark/unmark checklist * id = ID of parent container, name = name prefix, state = state [true/false] */ function marklist(id, name, state) { var parent = document.getElementById(id); if (!parent) { eval(''parent = document.'' + id); } if (!parent) { return; } var rb = parent.getElementsByTagName('input''); for (var r = 0; r < rb.length; r++) { if (rb[r].name.substr(0, name.length) == name) { rb[r].checked = state; } } } // ]]>
 


this.

and i use the regular old theme. its got the portal.

>> >> // 0) { if (base_url.indexOf(''?'') == -1) { document.location.href = base_url + ''?start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } else { document.location.href = base_url.replace(/&/g, ''&'') + ''&start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } } } /** * Find a member */ function find_username(url) { popup(url, 760, 570, ''_usersearch''); return false; } /** * Mark/unmark checklist * id = ID of parent container, name = name prefix, state = state [true/false] */ function marklist(id, name, state) { var parent = document.getElementById(id); if (!parent) { eval(''parent = document.'' + id); } if (!parent) { return; } var rb = parent.getElementsByTagName('input''); for (var r = 0; r < rb.length; r++) { if (rb[r].name.substr(0, name.length) == name) { rb[r].checked = state; } } } // ]]>
 


this.

and i use the regular old theme. its got the portal. 
?  I don't have this on my page anywhere as far as I can see, and I know I haven't changed the theme ever.  I mean, I believe you and it looks like Playerhata has the same problem, but it's odd that I don't and apparently Chopper too.

This problem only occurred with the original NNJG theme, Subsilver 2. It was just removed so now it's not longer a problem, but I miss it D:

Why remove it? that was my favorite one, all these other ones arent the same to me.

http://www.awesomestyles.com/phpbb3-styles/view/subsilver2

Who got rid of subsilver? I've been looking for a post that addressed why it was removed but this is the only thread even relating to it.. 

Ben/Gash why did you remove my favorite theme? :(
